import React,{useEffect,useRef}from'react';import*as THREE from'three';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ThreeDText=function ThreeDText(){var mountRef=useRef(null);var sceneRef=useRef(null);var rendererRef=useRef(null);var groupRef=useRef(null);var animationIdRef=useRef(null);useEffect(function(){if(!mountRef.current)return;// Scene setup
var scene=new THREE.Scene();sceneRef.current=scene;// Camera setup
var camera=new THREE.PerspectiveCamera(75,window.innerWidth/window.innerHeight,0.1,1000);camera.position.set(0,0,200);// Renderer setup
var renderer=new THREE.WebGLRenderer({alpha:true,antialias:true,powerPreference:"high-performance"});renderer.setSize(window.innerWidth,window.innerHeight);renderer.setClearColor(0x000000,0);renderer.setPixelRatio(Math.min(window.devicePixelRatio,2));rendererRef.current=renderer;// Lights
var ambientLight=new THREE.AmbientLight(0x404040,0.6);scene.add(ambientLight);var directionalLight=new THREE.DirectionalLight(0xffffff,0.8);directionalLight.position.set(1,1,1);scene.add(directionalLight);var pointLight=new THREE.PointLight(0xCC9933,1,1000);pointLight.position.set(0,0,100);scene.add(pointLight);// Group for text

return;}var letterGroup=new THREE.Group();var letterGeometry;// Create actual letter shapes
switch(letter.toLowerCase()){case'h':// H shape - two vertical bars connected by horizontal bar
var hLeft=new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.BoxGeometry(8,24,8),new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({color:0xCC9933,transparent:true,opacity:0.9}));hLeft.position.set(-8,0,0);letterGroup.add(hLeft);var hRight=new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.BoxGeometry(8,24,8),new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({color:0xCC9933,transparent:true,opacity:0.9}));hRight.position.set(8,0,0);letterGroup.add(hRight);var hMiddle=new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.BoxGeometry(16,6,8),new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({color:0xCC9933,transparent:true,opacity:0.9}));hMiddle.position.set(0,0,0);letterGroup.add(hMiddle);break;case'i':// I shape - vertical bar with dot on top

var exBar=new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.BoxGeometry(6,18,8),new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({color:0xCC9933,transparent:true,opacity:0.9}));exBar.position.set(0,2,0);letterGroup.add(exBar);var exDot=new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.BoxGeometry(6,6,8),new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({color:0xCC9933,transparent:true,opacity:0.9}));exDot.position.set(0,-10,0);letterGroup.add(exDot);break;case"'":// Apostrophe - small dot
letterGeometry=new THREE.BoxGeometry(4,6,8);break;case'm':// M shape - three vertical bars with diagonal connections
var mLeft=new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.BoxGeometry(6,20,8),new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({color:0xCC9933,transparent:true,opacity:0.9}));mLeft.position.set(-12,0,0);letterGroup.add(mLeft);var mRight=new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.BoxGeometry(6,20,8),new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({color:0xCC9933,transparent:true,opacity:0.9}));mRight.position.set(12,0,0);letterGroup.add(mRight);var mMiddle=new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.BoxGeometry(6,20,8),new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({color:0xCC9933,transparent:true,opacity:0.9}));mMiddle.position.set(0,0,0);letterGroup.add(mMiddle);// Diagonal connections
var mDiag1=new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.BoxGeometry(12,4,8),new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({color:0xCC9933,transparent:true,opacity:0.9}));mDiag1.position.set(-6,6,0);mDiag1.rotation.z=Math.PI/6;letterGroup.add(mDiag1);var mDiag2=new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.BoxGeometry(12,4,8),new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({color:0xCC9933,transparent:true,opacity:0.9}));mDiag2.position.set(6,6,0);mDiag2.rotation.z=-Math.PI/6;letterGroup.add(mDiag2);break;case's':// S shape - curved using multiple segments

var aLeft=new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.BoxGeometry(4,20,8),new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({color:0xCC9933,transparent:true,opacity:0.9}));aLeft.position.set(-6,0,0);aLeft.rotation.z=Math.PI/6;letterGroup.add(aLeft);var aRight=new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.BoxGeometry(4,20,8),new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({color:0xCC9933,transparent:true,opacity:0.9}));aRight.position.set(6,0,0);aRight.rotation.z=-Math.PI/6;letterGroup.add(aRight);var aCross=new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.BoxGeometry(12,4,8),new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({color:0xCC9933,transparent:true,opacity:0.9}));aCross.position.set(0,0,0);letterGroup.add(aCross);break;case'k':// K shape - vertical bar with two diagonal branches
var kBar=new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.BoxGeometry(6,20,8),new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({color:0xCC9933,transparent:true,opacity:0.9}));kBar.position.set(-3,0,0);letterGroup.add(kBar);var kTop=new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.BoxGeometry(12,4,8),new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({color:0xCC9933,transparent:true,opacity:0.9}));kTop.position.set(3,6,0);kTop.rotation.z=-Math.PI/4;letterGroup.add(kTop);var kBottom=new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.BoxGeometry(12,4,8),new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({color:0xCC9933,transparent:true,opacity:0.9}));kBottom.position.set(3,-6,0);kBottom.rotation.z=Math.PI/4;letterGroup.add(kBottom);break;case'e':// E shape - vertical bar with three horizontal bars
var eBar=new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.BoxGeometry(6,20,8),new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({color:0xCC9933,transparent:true,opacity:0.9}));eBar.position.set(-3,0,0);letterGroup.add(eBar);var eTop=new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.BoxGeometry(12,4,8),new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({color:0xCC9933,transparent:true,opacity:0.9}));eTop.position.set(3,8,0);letterGroup.add(eTop);var eMiddle=new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.BoxGeometry(12,4,8),new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({color:0xCC9933,transparent:true,opacity:0.9}));eMiddle.position.set(3,0,0);letterGroup.add(eMiddle);var eBottom=new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.BoxGeometry(12,4,8),new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({color:0xCC9933,transparent:true,opacity:0.9}));eBottom.position.set(3,-8,0);letterGroup.add(eBottom);break;case't':// T shape - horizontal bar with vertical bar
var tTop=new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.BoxGeometry(16,4,8),new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({color:0xCC9933,transparent:true,opacity:0.9}));tTop.position.set(0,8,0);letterGroup.add(tTop);var tBar=new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.BoxGeometry(4,16,8),new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({color:0xCC9933,transparent:true,opacity:0.9}));tBar.position.set(0,0,0);letterGroup.add(tBar);break;default:// Default letter - simple rectangle
letterGeometry=new THREE.BoxGeometry(12,20,8);}// If we have a simple geometry, create the mesh
if(letterGeometry){var material=new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({color:0xCC9933,transparent:true,opacity:0.9,shininess:100});var letterMesh=new THREE.Mesh(letterGeometry,material);letterGroup.add(letterMesh);}// Position the letter group
letterGroup.position.x=currentX;letterGroup.position.y=0;letterGroup.position.z=0;group.add(letterGroup);// Update position for next letter
if(letter==='!'){currentX+=20;}else if(letter==="'"){currentX+=12;}else if(letter==='h'||letter==='m'){currentX+=30;}else if(letter==='s'||letter==='a'||letter==='k'){currentX+=25;}else if(letter==='e'||letter==='t'){currentX+=22;}else{currentX+=18;}});// Center the entire text group
group.position.x=-currentX/2;// Add to DOM
mountRef.current.appendChild(renderer.domElement);// Animation loop - no movement, just render
var animate=function animate(){animationIdRef.current=requestAnimationFrame(animate);renderer.render(scene,camera);};animate();// Handle window resize
var handleResize=function handleResize(){camera.aspect=window.innerWidth/window.innerHeight;camera.updateProjectionMatrix();renderer.setSize(window.innerWidth,window.innerHeight);};window.addEventListener('resize',handleResize);// Cleanup
return function(){var currentMount=mountRef.current;window.removeEventListener('resize',handleResize);if(animationIdRef.current){cancelAnimationFrame(animationIdRef.current);}if(currentMount&&renderer.domElement){currentMount.removeChild(renderer.domElement);}renderer.dispose();};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{ref:mountRef,style:{position:'absolute',top:'50%',left:'50%',transform:'translate(-50%, -50%)',width:'100%',height:'100%',zIndex:1,pointerEvents:'none'}});};export default ThreeDText;
